synopsis.text: Gaowei, a young man, meets an untimely end in an airplane crash only to find himself reincarnated as the ancestor of the Cecil family on the Loren continent. As the grand duke Gawain, he witnesses the rise and fall of civilizations for millennia while residing on a space station orbiting a peculiar planet. Faced with a declining family lineage, he takes it upon himself to expand their territory and challenge societal class barriers using collective wisdom. However, with cultists running amok and an impending demonic crisis looming, Gaowei must navigate through these challenges in a world on the brink of an era's end. Will he succeed in shaping the fate of this new world? Join Gaowei on this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
